name: Ojama Emperor

3 Beast monsters, including an “Ojama” monster
If “Ojama Country” is in a Field Zone, this card gains 3000 ATK, also it cannot be destroyed by card effects. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving this card. You can target 1 “Ojama” monster in your GY, except a Link Monster; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Fusion Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Ojama Emperor" once per turn.
